thread.title: The best items to buy in January including jewelry, TVs
thread.title_full: The best items to buy in January including jewelry, TVs - TODAY.com

author: Christina Poletto
title: The best items to buy in January including jewelry, TVs
text:
With the holidays now behind us, you may have put the kibosh on all shopping sprees and tucked your wallet safely away from any new credit-based transactions. But with the array of new deals and bargains popping up this month, you might want to reconsider.
According to financial editor Farnoosh Torabi, the host of the award-winning podcast So Money and contributor to O, The Oprah Magazine, January is actually a very smart time for shoppers to land incredible deals with electronics, appliances and even jewelry.
 What to buy in 2017: Game systems, gym memberships, jewelry Play Video - 2:59 What to buy in 2017: Game systems, gym memberships, jewelry Play Video - 2:59 Here are her picks for top deals to consider:
Flat screen TVs Samsung 40" Ultra High Definition TV, $650, Best Buy
bestbuy.com A great size for a living room or mid-sized home theater space. This Smart TV comes with built-in WiFi, letting you stream movies and music, and surf your favorite websites with the included Web browser. The retail price was originally $899.99, and it's currently on sale for $649.99 through January 7th.
Video games and game consoles Xbox.com video games, from $35.99, Xbox
Xbox.com Xbox.com Starting January 1 for a limited time, buy any new Xbox One S bundle and get $20 off at participating retailers nationwide. And now through Jan. 9, visit Xbox.com for discounts of up to 50 percent off some of this year’s most popular games, like “Dead Rising 4,” “FIFA 17,” “Watch Dogs 2” and “Overwatch: Origins Edition.”
PlayStation 4 Slim 500GB Uncharted 4 Bundle, $269, Walmart
Walmart.com This system and game combo is a dream come true for gamers! It's currently on sale for $30 less.
RELATED : Need help getting organized? 12 items to help you keep your resolution
Jewelry Necklaces, $19.99 each, Sears
Sears.com Sears.com With Valentine's Day around the corner, it’s smart to get a head start if you're in the market for a nice piece of jewelry. We’re seeing price cuts from high end to costume jewelry. For statement pieces, the online vendor Bauble Bar offers currently offers selections up to 30% off.
Flamenco earrings, $22, Bauble Bar
Baublebar.com Athena Bib necklace, $40, Bauble Bar
Baublebar.com Fitness equipment Nordic Track Elliptical machine, $600, Sears
Sears.com Featuring a web-enabled touchscreen, you can easily access fitness apps, watch videos or browse the Internet right at your fingertips. A power-adjustable ramp allows you to modify the machine's angle to work everything from quads to glutes. With 32 pre-loaded workouts and iFit compatibility, you can perform professional-grade routines from the comfort of your own home gym.
RELATED: Bundle up! The best cold-weather gear to wear right now
Active Wear Active tops, leggings and bras, now 50% off, Old Navy
oldnavy.com Athletic wear, up to 70% off, Zulily
Zulily.com With deals like this, there's no excuse not to get dressed to get fit! Whether you make it out the door or to the gym is up to you.
Tools Craftsman Mechanic's Tool set, $99.99, Sears
Sears.com The 230-piece mechanic's tool set has what you need for most any job — from any project as complicated as spending the day under the hood to simple tasks like tightening bolts. Keep your eyes peeled — various Craftsmen tools from Sears are up to 50% off right now.
Craftsman Metric Wrench Set, $49.99, Sears
Sears.com Featuring a rugged steel build, precision shaping and the variety of sizes you need to cover a whole range of tasks, this 24-piece metric wrench set reduces slip and rounding while helping you do the job right.
RELATED: New year, new look! 5 fresh new trends to try in 2017
Appliances Samsung High Efficiency Washer and Dryer, $599 each, Lowe's
Lowes.com This stackable washer and dryer with steam cycle features Energy Star, and will help you save on your energy bill, too! The washer features nine wash cycles, including sanitize and allergen cycles that eliminate up to 99% of bacteria and kill up to 95% of pet dander and dust mites. The dryer, which matches the washer model, features four temperature options and 11 cycle selections, including a sanitization and quick dry cycle. To get the best deal, shop between 1/11-1/24 to get the sale price.
